name: Ninja Pig and the assasination of Mr. Longface
name_original: Ninja Pig and the assasination of Mr. Longface
description:
a game made for NinjaPig for the secret Santa Jam!

WASD or arrows movement

press UP or SPACE to jump

press RIGHT MOUSE or ENTER to attack

sometimes the music may be out of sync, this is less of an issue on the Windows version

Music: Tears in Rain by MK Ultra

Game by WeenterMakesGames

If you're reading this NinjaPig, please leave a comment! Merry Christmas!
